entity.description: Represents a logical group of DMEntity sharing the same implementation

property.description: Contains the list of DMEntities this repository contains, stored in a hashtable where the key if the full-qualified name of the entity

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DMEntity
entity.description: Represents a class and its definition

property.name: properties
property.description: Contains the list of DMProperties attached to this entity, stored in a hashtable where the key if the name of the property

property.name: repository
property.description: Repository where this entity is declared

property.name: isReadOnly
property.description: When set to true, means that this entity could not be modified

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.LoadableDMEntity
entity.description: Represents a class and its definition which is present in the class loader

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.eo.DMEOEntity
entity.description: Represents a class and its definition for objects stored in database

property.name: DMEOModel
property.description: DMEOModel where this entity is registered

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.DMProperty
entity.description: Represents an accessor as a get/set key-value pair

property.name: cardinality
property.description: Kind of cardinality (SINGLE, VECTOR, HASHTABLE, ARRAY)

property.name: isReadOnly
property.description: When set to true, means that this property cannot be modified

property.name: isSettable
property.description: When set to false, means that this property can only be read

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.eo.DMEOProperty
entity.description: Represents an accessor as a get/set key-value pair mapping a data stored in a database

property.name: columnName
property.description: Name of column in related table

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.eo.DMEOAttribute
entity.description: Represents an accessor implemented as an attribute (field in a DB table)

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.dm.eo.DMEORelationship
entity.description: Represents an accessor implemented as a relationship (relationship between DB tables)
